para.text: There is established a Stakeholder Council, which shall consist of the following members:
The Deputy Mayor for Public Safety and Justice;
The Chief of MPD;
The Chief Medical Examiner;
The Attorney General;
The United States Attorney for the District of Columbia;
The Director of the Public Defender Service for the District of Columbia;
The Federal Public Defender for the District of Columbia;
The Director of the Department of Health;
The Chief of the Fire and Emergency Medical Services Department;
The Director of the Department; and
Not Funded.
The head of any other government agency that regularly utilizes the forensic science services or public health laboratory services of the Department.
Not Funded.
Not Funded.
The chairperson of the Judiciary Committee of the Council of the District of Columbia shall be an ex officio, non-voting member of the Stakeholder Council.
The members listed in subsection (a) of this section shall not be represented by a designee.
The chairperson of the Stakeholder Council shall be the Deputy Mayor for Public Safety and Justice. In his or her absence, the Attorney General shall be the chairperson.
Not Funded.
The Stakeholder Council shall meet no fewer than 2 times per year. The chairperson shall fix the time and place of the meetings.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 24-348: § 10 of D.C. Law 24-348 provided that the change made to this section by § 2(r) of D.C. Law 24-348 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
